attributes.action: Prevent Russian Long-Range bombers, Entering British airspace.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today eight RUSSIAN LONG-RANGE BOMBERS violated our airspace. There have been several similar incidents in recent months, according to Lt-Col Oegland. 

Our primeinister should not allow himself to be violated and pressured this way. Or at least make a public stand, notifying our citizens.
